name: Belphegor
skill: Deals 2674/3194 DMG to the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.
ability: Slightly decrease the ATK speed of all foes at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the demon of sloth, one of the seven deadly sins. She herself is an out-and-out lazybones, and spares no effort in being lazy. She works for Chronos, however, and, having someone have hopes for her for the first time, she tries to measure up to his expectations. Lately, however, she has become emotionally dependent on him.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Defeat LVL 80, 100, 150, 175, 200 Belphegor
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Random drops after LVL 80.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the total Event Points during the "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" event.

skill: "I just want to get this over with..."
limit_break: "You mean...you want me to work even harder...?"
